select
,

,

insert into dp_user_balance
date,
total_consumption,
total_income,
balance,
registrar,
remark

mapper.update:
update dp_user_balance
total_consumption = #{totalConsumption,jdbcType=REAL},
total_income = #{totalIncome,jdbcType=REAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=REAL},
" registrar" = #{registrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
" remark" = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}

update dp_user_balance set total_consumption = #{totalConsumption,jdbcType=REAL}, total_income = #{totalIncome,jdbcType=REAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=REAL}, " registrar" = #{registrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, " remark" = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}
